posts.message:
فرصه لحضور مؤتمر تقني فى باريس مجاناً لشخصين شامل الإقامه وتذاكر الطيران.
الفرصه هتكون لواحد سعيد الحظ, وهيختار مرافق ليه, والمؤتمر متكفل بما سبق ذكره.

posts.description: We’re sending one lucky winner and a friend to Paris this December to attend Le Web, Europe’s largest tech and innovation conference. Hear from some of the leading names in the industry, expand your network, and get inspired by the City of Light.

posts.message:
If you are holding some realtime online event or so that targets developers in the U.S., which timezone / state would you optimize for?

Where the main criteria I think is getting the timezone that would suit the state(s) that have the most developers
